I genuinely bought a £120 mouse, £60 headphones, £60 for gaming mouse mat just to play this game lmao. This game is awesome when you’re having a good day and it’s bad when you’re having one of those days where you miss every shot. 😂
читаки на прайме. дисинхроны такие что даже оружие не стреляет.Чем дальше тем хуже.Играть только полной тимой, иначе попадаются тупые малолетки.
Hile sayisi azalsa yahut hic olmasa......en iyi oyun diyebilirim.....

Seja em competitivos, casuais, mata-mata, foi no CS GO que eu conheci amigos que passaram a ser verdadeiros irmãos online. Pessoas incríveis de todos os cantos desse país e até de fora dele. Os momentos divertidos e épicos são inúmeros, se eu pudesse recomendar um jogo que amo e sempre vou amar é o CS.
Каждая вторая катка читер с крутилкой, это жестко....
i got sworn at in russian, Overall great experience

Игра в которую не стыдно играть норм пацанам. Здесь можно показывать свой скилл, нагибать врагов и отлетать от их пуль. Крутым бонусом также является открытие кейсов в игре. Я когда узнал об этом, бросил универ и понял что никогда не буду работать . Правда пришлось продать квартиру и жить с родителями , но я уверен что кейсы сделают все за меня и я разбогатею. Спасибо Габену! 
p.s Лучше в кс с пацанами, чем в клубе с блядью

el mejor juego para pasarla con amigos, pero si no estas de humor la cagas en especial en competitivo 
PD: no abran cs cuando no estan de humor, webones

líbí se mi mody 
ale najednou nemuzu hrát kompetitivní mody 21 hodin nevím proč

In my opinion, the last golden age valve game.  probably one of their most popular multiplayer games ever.
a must have for fps fans in my opinion.
Its a very good game in terms of learning mechanics and grinding, can be frustrating sometimes but that's rare.

I've played for 58 hours (as of this writing) and I've yet to join an actual multiplayer match.  :)  But this is my "calm down" game after a rough day at work.  Log in, pick a map (I love "Vertigo") and kill bots until my blood pressure comes down.
Good game very pay to win with skins but good game

acabei de testar a source dois e piora este jogo espetacular por isso espero que mantenham assim sem atualizacoes relevantes, manter 64 ticks, poucos cheaters alias quase nenhum mesmo, e nao haver ot quando empatamos que assim ninguem fica a perder. Beijos
Короче, игра топ, узнал много про свою семью

The game play was fine. The only issue and it is a terrible issue is people using hacks. I went up against people using aim bot. Went up against people use wall vision hack. Went up against people where there weapons were more superior.  For this reason it is very unlikable. I would love to see a game where there is no hacks. It would put games more fair. I seen where they have tournaments with this game. That would be so much more fun if you knew there were no hacks involved.
